explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance, corporate financial risk (CFR), and corporate finance efficiency (CFE) using data envelopment analysis (DEA) and entity-fixed effects regression. It does not mention or involve any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it discuss any related concepts such as supervised learning, unsupervised learning, neural networks, or large language models.
